page.description: Parse the SQLStatement passed (or the value previously set into the SQLStatement property).
page.original:
SQL::DeleteStatement::Parse() Syntax Result_Flag as L = .Parse( [ SQL_Statement as C ] ) Argument Description Result_Flag TRUE (.T.) if the operation was successful; otherwise FALSE (.F.). A SQL::DeleteStatement object. SQL_Statement Optional. A Portable SQL statement.
Description The .Parse() method parses the SQL_Statement string (or the value previously set into the SQL::DeleteStatement.SQLStatement property). Example dim del as SQL::DeleteStatement del.SQLstatement = "DELETE FROM Customer WHERE lastname > 'G'" ? del.parse() = .T.
See Also SQL::DeleteStatement Object Limitations
